title: Blog Section Fields

fields.label: Section Title
fields.name: section_title
fields.instructions: Enter the main heading for the blog section.

fields.label: Section Description
fields.name: section_description
fields.instructions: Enter a brief description for the blog section.
fields.default_value: Stay informed with our latest articles, guides, and industry insights.

fields.label: Number of Posts
fields.name: posts_per_page
fields.instructions: Number of blog posts to display (default: 3).

fields.label: Post Categories
fields.name: post_categories
fields.instructions: Select specific categories to filter posts (leave empty to show all).

fields.label: Order By
fields.name: orderby
fields.instructions: Select how to order the posts.

fields.label: Read More Text
fields.name: read_more_text
fields.instructions: Text to display for the read more link on each card.

fields.label: CTA Button
fields.name: cta_button
fields.instructions: Configure the main call-to-action button for the blog section.

description: Fields for the Blog Section block displaying articles, guides, and industry insights.
